It was fun, hilarious, sweet, sad, creative and they took the story in a direction I didn't predict! There was a lot to live up to, and I thought Frozen 2 was the best possible sequel. I'm definitely going again soon!

Movie was disjointed and lacked depth. Seemed as any plot hole was filled with some new superpower. Then there was the whole white man, American Indian & reparations symbology that really sunk the ship. No magic like the first one and jokes that missed the mark.

It is a great story. I praise Disney, praise JenniferLee from my heart. I am very touched by The sisters. From the beginning to the end, I was filled with Elsa are so beautiful and Anna was so cute‚Äîit was exactly the same as Frozen one.

Like its predecessor, "Frozen 2" is beautifully animated and the voice cast does an excellent job.  The best moment of the movie is Olaf the snowman's plot summary of the previous film.  Classic.  However that is all the positive things I can say about this movie.  It is not terrible by any means.  Fans of the first movie will not be disappointed.  However I feel the movie falls flat almost immediately.  The songs are good but mostly forgettable.  Also the story felt a bit contrived.  It seemed to me like the writers were desperate for a sequel that they did not think the story out very much.  I was certainly not bored by "Frozen 2" by any means, but I found myself not liking it as much as I thought I would.
yahh itz really good for a 9-year-old kid like me

One of the many things that mad the first movie a success was that the audience could relate to all the characters and the songs. Although it was fun to see the characters together again, none of the songs were relatable and the plot of the film seemed half-baked at best.
